body_html:
Thanks. I'm trying to get distributed working with MPI and cuda. I have a quite fast Mellanox Infiniband installation I would like to test it on. I keep running into compilation errors when enabling WITH_DISTRIBUTED=1.
I'm using mvapich2-gdr and cuda 8.0 and able to run their benchmarks connecting GPUs over MPI.
Is this the same packages this was developed with? Any tips for getting this to work?
